characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A white sedan is seen on the right side, gradually moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane. The black SUV on the right side is accelerating and overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while observing the white sedans movement. The vehicle is preparing to decelerate due to the potential cut-in behavior of the white sedan and the overtaking action of the black SUV.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane, indicating potential cut-in behavior. 2) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 3 meters away, accelerating and overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
